TopicTitle: Advanced Construction training won't go past CoB step

Articles.Content:
When I adjust the fuel levels in the rocket's tanks to see how the CoB indicator moves, the Next button remains inactive. I cannot click it and continue with the next step.

Is there a fix for this?

Thank you.

I haven't tried that tutorial myself (didn't even know there was one!) so this is all guesswork, but- have you tried restarting the tutorial from the beginning? If so, does it get stuck at the same point? Have you tried restarting KSP?

I just tried that training.  You need to empty both liquid-fuel/oxidizer tanks completely to zero (leaving the RCS tank at 96u) before you get the 'Next' button.

(The in-game training is helpful overall, but sometimes gives bad advice. You would not usually set the parachute to wait for 0.75 bar before deploying, because you might want to open the parachute before landing on mountains, where the air pressure is lower.  You would not usually reduce engine-thrust to 65% in the VAB, because you can do that in flight with the throttle, or find a design where you use engines that are just powerful enough. 
Probably these steps were included to show you the game controls. )
